name: Jumping Knight (itch) (Nyxyo_IXI, JeromevDEV, 3rtex, spridev)
description: Jumping Knight is a 4 player multiplayer game where you compete with your friends to see who can climb the tower the fastest. The game is dynamic and very nervous thanks to the many bonuses that can be collected along the way.  This project was made in a group for a game design course during my Master degree.
